entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
